title: CHAPTER I. A CANDIDATE FOR THE POORHOUSE.

book.title: The Young Musician or, Fighting His Way
book.description: 简介： As for the boy, said Squire Pope, with his usual autocratic air, I shall place him in the poorhouse.But, Benjamin, said gentle Mrs. Pope, who had a kindly and sympathetic heart, isn't that a little hard?...
